channel.title: Rebol3 ports for porting
channel.description:
We've been asked to collect all examples of Rebol3 ports for ideas on a rewrite to Ren-c, or, to see how they can be completely rewritten with a new model.
These are mine from a long time ago.
`https://github.com/gchiu/Rebol3/tree/master/protocols`
Includes:
* daytime * dns * email * fax * ftp * imap * pop3 * smtp * time * sl4a

item.title: Rebol3 ports for porting
item.dc:creator: gchiu
item.description:
@hostilefork also has suggested Andreas' zeromq extension could also be rewritten along these lines.

Read full topic
